languages.text: "Наконец-то!" {n}Арджента вскидывает оружие.{/n} "Да направит Он руку мою, ибо я есть гнев и возмездие Его!"
"At last!" {n}Argenta raises her weapon.{/n} "May He guide my hand, for I am His vengeful wrath!"
languages.original_text: "Наконец-то!" {n}Арджента вскидывает оружие.{/n} "Да направит Он руку мою, ибо я есть гнев и возмездие Его!"

traits.locale_text: "At last!" {n}Argenta raises her weapon.{/n} "May He guide my hand, for I am His vengeful wrath!"
"At last!" {n}Argenta raises her weapon.{/n} "May He guide my hand, for I am His vengeful wrath!"
"At last!" {n}Argenta raises her weapon.{/n} "May He guide my hand, for I am His vengeful wrath!"
"At last!" {n}Argenta raises her weapon.{/n} "May He guide my hand, for I am His vengeful wrath!"
"At last!" {n}Argenta raises her weapon.{/n} "May He guide my hand, for I am His vengeful wrath!"

languages.text: 「ついに！」{n}アルジェンタは武器を構えた。{/n}「皇帝よ、この手をお導きください。我は御身の復讐に燃える怒りとなろう！」
languages.original_text: "At last!" {n}Argenta raises her weapon.{/n} "May He guide my hand, for I am His vengeful wrath!"

traits.locale_text: 「ついに！」{n}アルジェンタは武器を構えた。{/n}「皇帝よ、この手をお導きください。我は御身の復讐に燃える怒りとなろう！」

languages.text: « Enfin ! {n}Argenta brandit son arme.{/n} Puisse-t-Il guider ma main, car je suis l'émissaire de Sa colère vengeresse ! »
languages.original_text: "At last!" {n}Argenta raises her weapon.{/n} "May He guide my hand, for I am His vengeful wrath!"

traits.locale_text: « Enfin ! {n}Argenta brandit son arme.{/n} Puisse-t-Il guider ma main, car je suis l'émissaire de Sa colère vengeresse ! »

languages.text: “终于要开战了！”{n}阿洁塔举起了武器。{/n}“愿神皇指引我的双手，因为我就是祂复仇的烈焰！”
languages.original_text: "At last!" {n}Argenta raises her weapon.{/n} "May He guide my hand, for I am His vengeful wrath!"

traits.locale_text: “终于要开战了！”{n}阿洁塔举起了武器。{/n}“愿神皇指引我的双手，因为我就是祂复仇的烈焰！”

languages.text: «¡Al fin!». {n}Argenta levanta el arma.{/n} «Que Él guíe mi mano, pues ¡yo desataré su cólera vengativa!».
languages.original_text: "At last!" {n}Argenta raises her weapon.{/n} "May He guide my hand, for I am His vengeful wrath!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Al fin!». {n}Argenta levanta el arma.{/n} «Que Él guíe mi mano, pues ¡yo desataré su cólera vengativa!».

languages.text: "Endlich!" {n}Argenta hebt die Waffe.{/n} "Möge er meine Hand führen, denn ich bin sein rachsüchtiger Zorn!"
languages.original_text: "At last!" {n}Argenta raises her weapon.{/n} "May He guide my hand, for I am His vengeful wrath!"

traits.locale_text: "Endlich!" {n}Argenta hebt die Waffe.{/n} "Möge er meine Hand führen, denn ich bin sein rachsüchtiger Zorn!"

languages.text: "Nihayet!" {n}Argenta silahını kaldırıyor.{/n} "Ey İmparator, koluma güç ver ki intikamının gazabını gösterebileyim!"
languages.original_text: "At last!" {n}Argenta raises her weapon.{/n} "May He guide my hand, for I am His vengeful wrath!"

traits.locale_text: "Nihayet!" {n}Argenta silahını kaldırıyor.{/n} "Ey İmparator, koluma güç ver ki intikamının gazabını gösterebileyim!"
